name: Frisson
description:
Long: Frisson is a top-down single-player game that places you in the seat of a sadistic game-maker that forces people in an arena to make them fight to the death until only one person remains. Watch as they interact with the world and form strategies to survive. However, it's not enough to just survive the lone wilderness; you're also given tools to stir the pot a little…

Design as many players as you want, plop them down into an arena, and watch as they scavenge, build, bargain, fight, kill, and die. You are given many tools to make things harder for them, like natural disasters, explosives, and other fun abilities. The game ends when only one person is left alive. But until then, watch the world breathe and change dynamically.
